Class PreviewDialog

                      org.apache.fop.render.awt.viewer.PreviewDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, StatusListener, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PreviewDialog
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements StatusListener

AWT Viewer main window. Surrounds a PreviewPanel with a bunch of pretty buttons and controls.

See Also:
Serialized Form
